subject: Re: A couple from the Aiwa Box
author: mllejade
full_text:
Hi Frank,

Heard both of these very clearly!  And I don't know where the Munchkins one came from, but it's not your imagination, Frank, I heard it too.

Thanks again for sharing,
Sharon

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  The Munchkins voice might be iffy, as I was watching some of the Wizard Of
> Oz yesterday, and today I heard this. So do they add it tot tape, or is my
> imagination? The box one, I always work on boxes...
> 
> F-S
>
